wf_workflow_version.description: Request approval from Admin and set state value on reject or approve.
wf_workflow_version.name: Incident Approval
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Request approval from Admin and set state value on reject or approve.
wf_workflow.name: Incident Approval

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
Incident ${number} has been processed by ${assigned_to}

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
Incident ${number} has been processed by ${assigned_to}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
New Incident ${number} has been created by ${u_reporter}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
New Incident ${number} has been created by ${u_reporter}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
New Incident ${number} has been rejected by ${assigned_to}

Hello ${u_reporter}/${assigned_to},
New Incident ${number} has been rejected by ${assigned_to}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: Set State is closed and approval staus is Rejected
